data_table.description: Incident CHD and Heart Failure Data. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MI07
variable.comment: MIYY=1 if there was a definite or probable MI before 31DECYY. NOTE: the history variable (PRVCHD05) is not used for defining MIYY so that each researcher can determine defining missing history events as incident events or not.

variable.name: SOURCINC
variable.description: Incident Source: myocardial infarction or fatal coronary heart disease
variable.comment: SOURCINC is 'MI' if the event is definite or probable MI. SOURCINC is 'FATCHD' if the event is definite fatal CHD (and not definite or probable MI).

variable.name: SOURCIP
variable.description: Incident Source: myocardial infarction , fatal coronary heart disease or procedure
variable.comment: If IN_BYYYP=1, SOURCIP is 'MI' ('FATCHD') if there is no cardiac procedure or cardiac procedure is after the MI. SOURCIP is 'PROC' if there is no MI or FATCHD but has cardiac procedure, or if cardiac procedure is earlier than MI.
variable.value: No cardiac procedure or cardiac procedure is after the MI
No cardiac procedure or cardiac procedure is after the MI
No MI or FATCHD but has cardiac procedure, or if cardiac procedure is earlier than MI

variable.name: SOURCIS
variable.description: Incident Source: myocardial infarction , fatal coronary heart disease or SMI
variable.comment: SOURCIS is 'MI'('FATCHD') if the event is definite or probable MI (definite fatal CHD) and either there is no ECG serial changes, or ECG serial changes is after MI. SOURCIS is 'SMI' if the event is ECG MI (from serial changes) and either there is no MI/fatal CHD or MI/fatal CHD is after ECG evidence.
variable.value: Event is definite or probable MI (definite fatal CHD) and either there is no ECG serial changes, or ECG serial changes is after MI
Event is definite or probable MI (definite fatal CHD) and either there is no ECG serial changes, or ECG serial changes is after MI
Event is ECG MI (from serial changes) and either there is no MI/fatal CHD or MI/fatal CHD is after ECG evidence

variable.name: SOURCISP
variable.description: Incident Source: myocardial infarction , fatal coronary heart disease, procedure or SMI
variable.comment: SOURCISP is 'MI'('FATCHD') if the event is definite or probable MI (definite fatal CHD) and either there is no cardiac procedure/ECG serial changes, or cardiac procedure/ECG serial changes is after MI. SOURCISP is 'PROC'if the first event is a cardiac procedure. SOURCISP is 'SMI' if the first event is ECG MI (from serial changes).
variable.value: Event is definite or probable MI (definite fatal CHD) and either there is no cardiac procedure/ECG serial changes, or cardiac procedure/ECG serial changes is after MI
Event is definite or probable MI (definite fatal CHD) and either there is no cardiac procedure/ECG serial changes, or cardiac procedure/ECG serial changes is after MI
First event is a cardiac procedure
First event is ECG MI (from serial changes)

variable.name: TYPEINC
variable.comment: TYPEINC is 'F_MI' if the event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI. TYPEINC is 'N_MI if the event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI. TYPEINC is 'FATCHD' if the event is definite fatal CHD and not MI. TYPEINC='OTHER' if the fatal event has missing death date or the event has missing event date. TYPEINC= for non-events.
variable.value: Event is definite fatal CHD and not MI
Event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI
Event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI

variable.name: TYPEIP
variable.comment: TYPEIP is 'F_MI' if the event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI. TYPEIP is 'N_MI' if the event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI. TYPEIP is 'FATCHD' if the event is definite fatal CHD and not MI. TYPEIP is 'F_PROC' if the event is fatal within 28 days, and is a cardiac procedure. TYPEIP is 'N_PROC' if the event is non-fatal, or fatal after 28 days, and is a cardiac procedure. TYPEIP='OTHER' if the fatal event has missing death date or the event has missing event date. TYPEIP= for non-events.
variable.value: Event is definite fatal CHD and not MI. TYPEIP is 'F_PROC' if the event is fatal within 28 days, and is a cardiac procedure
Event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI
Event is fatal within 28 days, and is a cardiac procedure
Event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI
Event is non-fatal, or fatal after 28 days, and is a cardiac procedure

variable.name: TYPEIS
variable.description: Incident/fatal 28 days type tor In_07s [FATCHD, F_MI, N_MI, SMI, Missing]
variable.comment: TYPEIS is 'F_MI' if the event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI. TYPEIS is 'N_MI' if the event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI. TYPEIS is 'FATCHD' if the event is definite fatal CHD and not MI. TYPEIS='SMI' if the event is ECG MI (serial changes). TYPEIS= 'OTHER' if the fatal event has missing death date or the event has missing event date. TYPEIS= for non-events.
variable.value: Event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI
Event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI

variable.name: TYPEISP
variable.description: Incident/fatal days 28 type for In_07sp [FATCHD, F_MI, F_PROC, N_MI, N_PROC, SMI, Missing]
variable.comment: TYPEISP is 'F_MI' if the event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI. TYPEISP is 'N_MI' if the event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI. TYPEISP is 'FATCHD' if the event is definite fatal CHD and not MI. TYPEISP is 'F_PROC' if the event is fatal (within 28 days), and is a cardiac procedure. TYPEISP is 'N_PROC' if the event is non-fatal, or fatal after 28 days, and is a cardiac procedure. TYPEISP='SMI' if the event is ECG MI (serial changes). TYPEISP='OTHER' if the fatal event has missing death date or the event has missing event date. TYPEISP= for non-events.
variable.value: Event is definite fatal CHD and not MI
Event is fatal within 28 days (of the event date), and is definite or probable MI
Event is fatal (within 28 days), and is a cardiac procedure
Event is non-fatal or fatal after 28 days, and is definite or probable MI
Event is non-fatal, or fatal after 28 days, and is a cardiac procedure

variable.name: STSISP
variable.description: Survival status for In_07sp [Alive on 12/31/2007, Dead by 12/31/2007, FATCHD, F_MI, F_PROC, F_PROC, Loss to FU, N_MI, N_PROC, OTHER, SMI]
variable.comment: STSISP=TYPEISP for incident procedure events (IN_YYSP=1). For non-events (IN_YYSP=0), STSISP='Dead by 31DECYY' for dead by 19YY, ='Alive on 31DECYY' for those who were still alive on 31DECYY, ='Loss to FU' for lost to follow-up.

variable.name: STSIS
variable.description: Survival status for In_07s [Alive on 12/31/2007, Dead by 12/31/2007, FATCHD, F_MI, Loss to FU, N_MI, OTHER, SMI]
variable.comment: STSIS=TYPEIS for incident procedure events (IN_YYS=1). For those non-events (IN_YYS=0), STSIS='Dead by 31DECYY' for dead by 19YY, ='Alive on 31DECYY' for those who were still alive on 31DECYY, ='Loss to FU' for lost to follow-up.

variable.name: STSIP
variable.description: Survival status for In_by07p [Alive on 12/31/2007, Dead by 12/31/2007, FATCHD, F_MI, F_PROC, Loss to FU, N_MI, N_PROC, OTHER]
variable.comment: STSIP=TYPEIP for incident procedure events (IN_BYYYP=1). For those non-events (IN_BYYYP=0), STSIP='Dead by 31DECYY' for dead by 19YY, ='Alive on 31DECYY' for those who were still alive on 31DECYY, ='Loss to FU' for lost to follow-up.

variable.name: STSINC
variable.description: Survival status for Inc_by07 [Alive on 12/31/2007, Dead by 12/31/2007, FATCHD, F_MI, N_MI, OTHER, Loss to FU]
variable.comment: STSINC=TYPEINC for incident events (INC_BYYY=1). For those non-events (INC_BYYY=0), STSINC='Dead by 31DECYY' for dead by 19YY, ='Alive on 31DECYY' for those who were still alive on 31DECYY, ='Loss to FU' for lost to follow-up.

variable.name: ECGMI_V2
variable.description: ECG serial change myocardial infarction by V2
variable.comment: ECGMI_VX is the indicator of MI detected at visit X, which is determined by ECG serial changes.

variable.name: ECGMI_V3
variable.description: ECG serial change myocardial infarction by V3
variable.comment: ECGMI_VX is the indicator of MI detected at visit X, which is determined by ECG serial changes.

variable.name: ECGMI_V4
variable.description: ECG serial change myocardial infarction by V4
variable.comment: ECGMI_VX is the indicator of MI detected at visit X, which is determined by ECG serial changes.

variable.name: ECGBV_V3
variable.description: ECG baseline visit number for visit 3
variable.comment: ECGBV_VX is 1 if visit 1 ECG is available for serial change comparison, is 2 if visit 1 ECG is not available and visit 2 ECG is available for serial change comparison, and is 3 if visit 1 & visit 2 ECGs are not available and visit 3 ECG is available for serial change comparison and X=4.

variable.name: ECGBV_V4
variable.description: ECG baseline visit number for visit 4
variable.comment: ECGBV_VX is 1 if visit 1 ECG is available for serial change comparison, is 2 if visit 1 ECG is not available and visit 2 ECG is available for serial change comparison, and is 3 if visit 1 & visit 2 ECGs are not available and visit 3 ECG is available for serial change comparison and X=4.

variable.name: DEAD07
variable.comment: DEADYY=1 if a cohort participant died before 31DECYY.

variable.name: FUDTH07
variable.description: Follow Up Days to Death by 2007
